attributes.action: legislate that ALL vehicles that pass the same MOT emissions test ALL pay the same Road Fund Licence Duty..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a nonsense that larger sized engine vehicles are more damaging to the environment and in particular Mr Gordon Brown has a vendettta against 4x4 vehicles..in brief the way i see this is that if ALL vehicles on our roads HAVE to pass an emissions test as part of the MOT requirement then surely if the larger engine vehicle meets the same criteria as the smaller engine vehicle then surely it is only fair that ALL vehicles that pass the same emissions test must only have to pay the same Road Fund Licence Duty..
